head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RABINOWITZ, JOANNE GRANT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RABINOWITZ, JOANNE GRANT

block.p: RABINOWITZ--Joanne Grant. Award-winning writer, journalist, filmmaker, died on January 9, 2005. Born in Utica, NY, and resident of NYC and Easthampton, with a spell in London. She is survived by her children, Mark and Abby, and her husband Victor. A memorial service will be held at a later date and an announcement published.
